parts.name: VL Commodore RB30ET Turbo Kit
parts.description: Turbocharge the N/A RB30 in your VL Commodore. The 'Godzilla' of Aussie engines.

parts.name: Cleveland 351 V8 Intake
parts.description: Edelbrock Performer intake for the 351 Cleveland found in XA-XE Falcons.

parts.name: Miata (NA/NB) Suspension Refresh Kit
parts.description: Complete bushing and ball joint overhaul kit. Essential for restoring the legendary handling of the Roadster.

parts.name: RX-7 Apex Seal Kit (2mm/3mm)
parts.description: The heart of the rotary. Upgrade to Atkins or Goopy Performance seals for higher boost handling.

parts.name: RB26DETT N1 Oil Pump
parts.description: Critical upgrade for any RB26. The stock pump gear shatters at high RPM. N1 or Spline Drive is mandatory.

parts.name: Volvo Redblock 'Turbo+' Kit
parts.description: Factory upgrade kit that increased boost pressure. Now replicated with manual boost controllers and chips.

parts.name: PCV Breather System Kit
parts.description: The Achilles heel of the Whiteblock engine. Must be replaced every 100k miles to prevent seal blowout.

parts.name: Direct Ignition Cassette (Red/Black)
parts.description: The famous SAAB DIC. Red for Trionic 5, Black for Trionic 7. Do not use aftermarket, only SEM/OEM.

parts.name: Commodore LS Conversion Mounts
parts.description: Mounts to drop an LS1/LS3 into older VN-VS Commodores. The ultimate Aussie sleeper.

parts.name: Barra Swap Mounts (EA-AU)
parts.description: Put the mighty Barra Turbo into the lighter EA-AU chassis. 1000hp capable taxi motor.

parts.name: 2-inch Coil Spacer Lift
parts.description: Simple lift for the Tracker/Sidekick. Fits 235/75R15 tires for surprising off-road capability.

parts.name: G10 3-Cylinder Turbo Manifold
parts.description: Rare factory turbo parts or custom log manifold to boost the 1.0L 3-banger.

parts.name: Forester ADF Lift Kit (2 inch)
parts.description: Anderson Design & Fabrication spacers. The standard for lifting Foresters for trail duty.

parts.name: VF52 Turbo Upgrade
parts.description: Direct bolt-on upgrade for Legacy GT. Good for 300whp with supporting mods.

parts.name: AE86 GTS LSD (T282)
parts.description: Factory Limited Slip Diff for the RWD Corolla. Essential for drifting.

parts.name: TRD Rear Sway Bar
parts.description: Drastically reduces understeer on FWD Corollas. Best bang-for-buck handling mod.

parts.name: Si Transmission (L3)
parts.description: Short ratio gearbox for the EF Civic. The best upgrade for a DX/LX.

parts.name: Weber Carburetor Conversion
parts.description: Replace the complex CVCC carb with a simple Weber 32/36. More power, easier tuning.

parts.name: VQ35DE Engine Swap
parts.description: Swap the 3.5L V6 from a newer Maxima/Altima into older chassis. 250+ hp NA.

parts.name: VR-4 / Evo Brake Upgrade
parts.description: Bolt on Evo Brembos or VR-4 calipers to the standard Galant/Legnum.

parts.name: 1G DSM Twin-Piston Brake Swap
parts.description: Use 1G DSM / VR-4 twin-piston front calipers and larger rotors on 6G Galant E30/E50 knuckles for a direct bolt-on upgrade.

parts.name: 7G Galant 5-Lug / Brake Upgrade
parts.description: Swap Carisma/Lancer/Evo I-III front knuckles to convert 7G Galant (EA1/EA3) to 5x114.3 and larger brakes; rear can use Carisma hub assemblies.

parts.name: Endeavor/Outlander Front Brake Upgrade
parts.description: 9G Galant can run Endeavor/early Outlander dual-piston calipers and larger rotors; direct fit with matching brackets.

parts.name: OME Suspension Lift
parts.description: Old Man Emu springs and shocks. The gold standard for Montero/Pajero overland builds.

parts.name: M50 Intake Manifold Swap
parts.description: Swap the OBD1 M50 manifold onto M52/S52 engines for better top-end flow.

parts.name: Transfer Case Reinforcement
parts.description: The weak link of the AWD X-Type. Ensure fluid is changed and cooling is adequate.

parts.name: Air to Coil Spring Conversion
parts.description: Delete the troublesome air suspension on P38/L322 Range Rovers for reliability.

parts.name: Eurocompulsion Tune
parts.description: Wake up the 1.4L MultiAir. Adds 30-40hp and improves throttle response.

parts.name: Rear Torsion Bar Adjustment
parts.description: Lower the rear of your Peugeot/Citroen/Renault by re-indexing the torsion bars.

parts.name: Edelbrock Finned Aluminum Heads
parts.description: Classic hot rod upgrade for the Flathead V8. Improves cooling and compression.

parts.name: Eaton M62 Supercharger (L67)
parts.description: Adapt the GM 3800 supercharger to the 2.2L/2.4L J-Body engines. Custom work required.

parts.name: Piston Soak / Ring Cleaning
parts.description: The 1.9L Saturn engines are notorious for stuck oil rings. A piston soak can help.

parts.name: Turbo II Conversion
parts.description: Swap the intercooled Turbo II setup onto any K-Car derivative. 174hp in a shoebox.

parts.name: M113 V8 Swap
parts.description: Since it's a Mercedes SLK320 underneath, the Mercedes V8 fits with effort.

parts.name: Manual Boost Controller
parts.description: Turn up the boost on the 660cc turbo engines. Keep it safe (under 1.0 bar).

parts.name: VR6 Engine Swap
parts.description: The definitive swap for Mk3 Golf/Jetta. The Wookie growl is legendary.

parts.name: Malone Stage 2 Tune
parts.description: Unlock the torque of the TDI. Great for towing and economy.

parts.name: Hella Rallye 4000 Spotlights
parts.description: Period correct rally lights for your homologation special.

parts.name: Bilstein 5100 Adjustable Struts
parts.description: Level the front end of your Ram 1500. Better ride than spacers.

parts.name: LSE (LS Engine) Swap
parts.description: The Catera is an Omega B. It fits an LS V8 just like the GTO/Commodore.

parts.name: Lucas Replacement Wiring Harness
parts.description: Replace the 'Prince of Darkness' wiring with a modern, reliable harness.

parts.name: Isuzu Impulse Suspension Parts
parts.description: The Geo Storm is an Isuzu Impulse. Use Impulse Handling by Lotus parts for upgrades.

parts.name: Sticky Summer Tires (215/45R16 & 245/40R17)
parts.description: The NSX/S2000 are tire sensitive. Use Bridgestone Potenza or Michelin Pilot Sport.

parts.name: Torsen LSD Swap
parts.description: Swap the open diff for the Torsen LSD from the R-Spec/Track models.

parts.name: 15% / 17% Supercharger Pulley
parts.description: The best mod for the R53 Mini Cooper S. More boost, more whine.

parts.name: Alfa 164 / Saab 9000 Brake Interchange
parts.description: The Type 4 platform mates (Alfa 164, Saab 9000, Fiat Croma, Lancia Thema) share many brake parts.

parts.name: Trifecta Tune
parts.description: Tuning for modern GM turbo engines (Cruze, Malibu, Equinox).

parts.name: ZX2 S/R Struts
parts.description: Tokico struts from the rare Escort ZX2 S/R. Great handling upgrade.

parts.name: Short Throw Shifter
parts.description: Essential for any Mustang (Fox, SN95, S197, S550). Fixes the sloppy stock throw.

parts.name: Cat-back Exhaust
parts.description: Unleash the sound of the GR Yaris/Corolla/Supra/86.
